name: GRT Network Diagnostics
body:
### GRT Network Diagnostics.
A Java Application that prints diagnostics information into a JFrame for setting up during competition.


### Current Features
* Realtime status (CONNECTED|DOWN) of important hosts (ex. cRIO, our robot laptop, axis camera).
* More will come in the future!

### Authors and Contributors
This project was created by FRC Team 192, aka the Gunn Robotics Team (or GRT).

### Support or Contact
Send an email to gerberduffy@gmail.com
tagline: A text-based diagnostics app for our 2012 Driver Station.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
